This repository houses Q-DNA, a local-first governance layer for AI agents.

## Current Status
- **Spec Compliance:** 95%
- **MCP Tools:** 36
- **Database Tables:** 11
- **All Tests:** PASSING
- **P0/P1/P2:** COMPLETE

## Core Documentation
- Specification: docs/Q-DNA_SPECIFICATION.md (v2.0)
- Compliance Audit: docs/SPEC_COMPLIANCE_AUDIT.md
- Development Plan: docs/DEVELOPMENT_PLAN.md
- PRD: docs/PRD.md

## Governance
- AAC Contract: docs/AGENT_ACCOUNTABILITY_CONTRACT.md
- Core Rules: config/rules/core_governance.md
- Risk Grading: config/rules/risk_grading.md
- Citation Policy: config/rules/citation_policy.md

## Research
- First Principles: docs/RESEARCH_FIRST_PRINCIPLES.md
- Sentinel Tech: docs/research/SENTINEL_TECH.md
- ROI Case Study: docs/ROI_CASE_STUDY.md

## Implementation

### MCP Server (36 tools)
- local_fortress/mcp_server/server.py (v2.3, ~1100 lines)

### Core Engines
- local_fortress/mcp_server/sentinel_engine.py (Verification)
- local_fortress/mcp_server/identity_manager.py (Ed25519)
- local_fortress/mcp_server/volatility_manager.py (TTL/SLA)
- local_fortress/mcp_server/credibility_manager.py (SCI/Quarantine)
- local_fortress/mcp_server/advanced_features.py (P2)
- local_fortress/mcp_server/bootstrapper.py (Evolution)

### Persistence
- Schema: local_fortress/ledger/schema.sql (11 tables)
- Keystore: local_fortress/keystore/

## Tool Categories
- Sentinel: audit_code, audit_claim
- Judge: log_event, apply_penalty
- Overseer: request_l3_approval, approve_l3, get_pending_approvals
- Shadow Genome: archive_failure
- Volatility: register_claim_with_ttl, check_claim_validity, get_expired_claims
- SLA: get_sla_status
- Identity: verify_signature
- System: set_operational_mode, get_system_status, system_health_check
- Credibility: register_source, check_source_credibility, update_source_verification, get_low_credibility_sources
- Quarantine: quarantine_agent, check_agent_quarantine, get_active_quarantines, release_expired_quarantines
- Fallback: check_sentinel_fallback
- Deferral: request_deferral, complete_deferral, get_active_deferrals, check_expired_deferrals
- Mode: check_verification_mode, get_mode_behavior
- Calibration: record_prediction, get_calibration_report, check_honest_error
- Reputation: record_clean_audit, get_all_agent_weights
